name: Espresso Shot test
description: A rich and bold single shot of espresso made from freshly ground beans.

name: Cappuccino
description: Espresso with steamed milk and a thick layer of foam.

name: Latte
description: Smooth and creamy, made with espresso and steamed milk.

name: Americano
description: Espresso diluted with hot water, for a lighter but bold taste.

name: Mocha
description: A delicious blend of espresso, chocolate syrup, and steamed milk.

name: Iced Coffee
description: Freshly brewed coffee served chilled over ice.

name: Cold Brew
description: Slow-steeped coffee for a smooth, low-acid cold drink.

name: Flat White
description: A velvety drink made with espresso and steamed milk, less foamy than a cappuccino.

name: Caramel Macchiato
description: Espresso with steamed milk and a drizzle of rich caramel syrup.

name: Vanilla Latte
description: Smooth espresso blended with vanilla syrup and steamed milk.

name: Hazelnut Coffee
description: A sweet nutty flavor added to our classic brewed coffee.

name: Affogato
description: A scoop of vanilla ice cream topped with a shot of hot espresso.

name: Turkish Coffee
description: Strong, unfiltered coffee brewed in a cezve with a thick foam.

name: Flat Black
description: A bold and strong cup of straight black coffee.
